# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10.2)
project(snowNet LANGUAGES C CXX ASM)

# target
add_library(snowNet STATIC "")
set_target_properties(snowNet PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "snowNet")
set_target_properties(snowNet PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "snowNetLib")
target_include_directories(snowNet PRIVATE
    snowNetLib
)
target_compile_options(snowNet PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(snowNet PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(snowNet PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
target_link_libraries(snowNet PRIVATE
    pthread
)
target_link_libraries(snowNet PRIVATE
)
target_sources(snowNet PRIVATE
    snowNetLib/Buffer.cc
    snowNetLib/Channel.cc
    snowNetLib/EventLoopThread.cc
    snowNetLib/Socket.cc
    snowNetLib/DefaultPoller.cc
    snowNetLib/TimerQueue.cc
    snowNetLib/Poller.cc
    snowNetLib/CurrentThread.cc
    snowNetLib/TcpServer.cc
    snowNetLib/Timestamp.cc
    snowNetLib/Logger.cc
    snowNetLib/Acceptor.cc
    snowNetLib/EventLoopThreadPool.cc
    snowNetLib/TcpConnection.cc
    snowNetLib/EPollPoller.cc
    snowNetLib/EventLoop.cc
    snowNetLib/InetAddress.cc
    snowNetLib/Timer.cc
    snowNetLib/Thread.cc
)

# target
add_executable(test "")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "test")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "test")
add_dependencies(test snowNet)
target_include_directories(test PRIVATE
    snowNetLib
)
target_include_directories(test PRIVATE
    /home/ubuntu/.xmake/packages/p/protobuf-cpp/3.17.3/a1a77e91681444dfabbebbe427729d72/include
)
target_compile_options(test PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
target_compile_features(test PRIVATE cxx_std_11)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(test PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(test PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
target_link_libraries(test PRIVATE
    protobuf
    snowNet
    pthread
    pthread
)
if(MSVC)
    target_link_libraries(test PRIVATE
        -libpath:/home/ubuntu/.xmake/packages/p/protobuf-cpp/3.17.3/a1a77e91681444dfabbebbe427729d72/lib
        -libpath:snowNetLib
    )
else()
    target_link_libraries(test PRIVATE
        -L/home/ubuntu/.xmake/packages/p/protobuf-cpp/3.17.3/a1a77e91681444dfabbebbe427729d72/lib
        -LsnowNetLib
    )
endif()
target_link_libraries(test PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(test PRIVATE
    src/rpcHeader.pb.cc
    src/snowDb.pb.cc
    src/snowDBService.cc
    src/rpcApp.cc
    src/config.cc
    src/rpcProvider.cc
    src/db/db/include/util.cc
    src/db/db/include/test.cc
    src/db/db/include/db.cc
    src/db/db/include/skipList.cc
    src/db/db/include/entry.cc
    src/db/db/include/format.cc
)
